newsitem.title: GERMANY: Alte Leipziger says not in talks to sell BHF stake.
newsitem.headline: Alte Leipziger says not in talks to sell BHF stake.

text.p: German insurer Alte Leipziger said on Friday it was not in talks to sell its 6.9 percent stake in BHF-Bank AG and added that it saw no reason to want to start such talks.
"If there were to be talks about a sale this would have to be at initiative of the bank's management and supervisory boards or in cooperation with the boards," the insurer said in a statement.
"Our aim in that case would be to work out a strategy with the bank and the other shareholders to find the optimum solution in BHF-Bank's interest."
Shares in BHF-Bank rose sharply on Friday following a report in Boersen-Zeitung that Bankgesellschaft Berlin AG was interested in buying a majority stake in the bank.
